task.title: Create a LinkedIn App for Use with Livefyre Identity
task.shortdesc: You can use Livefyre Identity with LinkedIn to allow users to use their LinkedIn logins to interact Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable LinkedIn login, Livefyre requires the following LinkedIn app information:
To create a LinkedIn App for use with Livefyre Identity:

step.cmd: Go to https://www.linkedin.com/secure/developer, and sign into your LinkedIn account to create a new or select an existing app for use with Livefyre Identity.
Complete the form to create the Application.
In the Default Application Permissions, enable the r_basicprofile and r_emailaddress app permissions.
Enter the OAuth 2.0 Authorized Redirect URL as https://identity.livefyre.com/{network-name}.fyre.co/api/v1.0/public/profile/social/complete/linkedin_fyre.
In Livefyre > Integration Settings > Livefyre Identity > LinkedIn, switch the Enable LinkedIn Login toggle to On.
Enter the LinkedIn Client ID and LinkedIn Client Secret.

taskbody.result: When complete, LinkedIn’s app details page will list the app’s API Key (Consumer Key) and API Secret (Consumer Secret) for use in Studio’s Integration Settings page.
